name: Annem Görmesin
description:
I participated in the Evinde Kal Game Jam online event organized by tiplay studio on 27-29 March 2020. As a team with the people I just met, we developed a mobile game called "Annem Görmesin".

Game Description: There are two naughty children that throwing each other cologne, toilet paper and mouth masks in the house. If their mother sees this, she throws slippers on them. The player tries to survive and also shoot the other child by controls the child of his/her choosed. Each thrown item deals different levels of damage. However, the score of the player decreases according to the type of item he throws. Therefore the player should use items sparingly. Two people can play the game mutually at the same time.

Credits: Senem Aksakal, Mertcan Cihan, Semih Durgun, Batuhan Ul
